      <td nowrap valign=bottom style=' padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style=' padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style=' padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style=' padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style=' padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style=' padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

  <table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="94%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(A)</font></p></td>
      <td width="95%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The
          term &#147;earnings&#148; shall be defined as pretax income from continuing
          operations. Add to pretax income the amount of fixed charges adjusted
          to exclude the amount of any interest capitalized during the period.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="95%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(B)</font></p></td>
      <td width="95%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Fixed
          Charges represent (a) interest, whether expensed or capitalized, (b)
          amortization of debt discount, premium and expense and (c) an estimate
          of interest implicit in rentals.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><B><font SIZE=2>EXHIBIT 12.2</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>PUBLIC SERVICE ELECTRIC AND GAS COMPANY</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>COMPUTATION OF RATIOS OF EARNINGS TO FIXED CHARGES</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>PLUS PREFERRED SECURITIES DIVIDEND REQUIREMENTS</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

      <td width="3%" valign=bottom style='border-top:solid black 1.0pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>

      <td width="3%" valign=bottom style='border-top:solid black 1.0pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>

      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='padding:0in .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='padding:0in .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='page-break-inside:avoid'>
      <td valign=top > <p style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;text-align:left;margin-top:1.5pt;margin-bottom: 0in'><font size=2>Ratio
          of Earnings to Fixed Charges </font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:1.5pt;margin-bottom:0in'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.37</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.79</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.65</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.59</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.93</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.75</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; '> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.67</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='page-break-inside:avoid'>
      <td valign=top > <p style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom > <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

  <table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="94%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(A)</font></p></td>
      <td width="95%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The
          term &#147;earnings&#148; shall be defined as pretax income from continuing
          operations. Add to pretax income the amount of fixed charges adjusted
          to exclude (a) the amount of any interest capitalized during the period
          (b) the actual amount of any preferred securities dividend requirements
          of majority owned subsidiaries (c) preferred stock dividends which were
          included in such fixed charges amount but not deducted in the determination
          of pre-tax income.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="95%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(B)</font></p></td>
      <td width="95%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Fixed
          Charges represent (a) interest, whether expensed or capitalized, (b)
          amortization of debt discount and premium expense (c) an estimate of
          interest implicit in rentals and (d) preferred securities dividend requirements
          of majority owned subsidiaries and preferred stock dividends, increased
          to reflect the pre-tax earnings requirement for PSE&amp;G.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'>
</p>

      <td width="0" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;  background:white'>

      <td width="0" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;  background:white'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:center;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;  background:white'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td colspan="2" valign=bottom style=' border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;  background:white'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:center;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><b>2002</b></font></p></td>

      <td width="49%" valign=top style='background:#e5ffff'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:1.5pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>

      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:#e5ffff'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:1.5pt;margin-bottom:0.5pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>

        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>
          4.90</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>

      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>

      <td width="5%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>
          3.82</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>
          3.70</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>
          2.97</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="5%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:1.5pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>
          4.24 </font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff;padding:0in .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:1.5pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>
          4.14 </font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom:double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt; background:#e5ffff;padding:0in .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:1.5pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size="2"><br>
          3.73 </font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:#e5ffff'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:1.5pt;margin-bottom:0.5pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='page-break-inside:avoid'>
      <td width="49%" valign=top style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="5%" valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="5%" valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="5%" valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="1%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="4%" valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="0%" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

  <table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
      <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'> <p ><font size=2>(A)</font></p></td>
      <td width="92%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'> <p ><font size=2>The
          term &#147;earnings&#148; shall be defined as pre-tax Income from Continuing
          Operations. Add to pre-tax income the amount of fixed charges adjusted
          to exclude the amount of any interest capitalized during the period.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr >
      <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'> <p ><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="92%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'> <p ><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr >
      <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'> <p ><font size=2>(B)</font></p></td>
      <td width="92%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'> <p ><font size=2>Fixed
          Charges represent (a) interest, whether expensed or capitalized, (b)
          amortization of debt discount, premium and expense and (c) an estimate
          of interest implicit in rentals.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

      <td colspan="2" valign=bottom style=' border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;  background:white'>

      <td width="3%" valign=bottom style='border-bottom: solid black 1.0pt;background: white'>

      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.12</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.22</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.39</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(0.75
          </font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>)</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='border-bottom: double black 2.25pt;background:#DDFFFF;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.88
          </font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:#DDFFFF'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:1.5pt;margin-bottom:0.5pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='page-break-inside:avoid'>
      <td nowrap valign=top style='background:white; padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td colspan="2" valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style=' background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td nowrap valign=bottom style='background:white;padding:.75pt .75pt 0in .75pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:right;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td valign=bottom style='background:white'> <p style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

  <table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="5%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:2.25pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(A)</font></p></td>
      <td width="94%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The
          term &#147;earnings&#148; is defined as pre-tax income from continuing
          operations before income or loss from equity investees plus distributed
          income from equity investees. Add to pre-tax income the amount of fixed
          charges adjusted to exclude the amount of any interest capitalized during
          the period. </font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="5%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="94%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="5%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(B)</font></p></td>
      <td width="94%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Fixed
          Charges represent (a) interest, whether expensed or capitalized, (b)
          amortization of debt discount, premium and expense (c) an estimate of
          interest implicit in rentals.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="5%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
      <td width="94%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p></td>
    </tr>
    <tr style='height:12.6pt'>
      <td width="5%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(C)</font></p></td>
      <td width="94%" valign=top style='padding:0in 1.5pt 0in 1.5pt; height:12.6pt'>
        <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The
          ratio of earnings to fixed charges for the nine months ended September
          30, 2006 was 0.59, as noted above, which represents a deficiency of
          $62 million. The ratio of earnings to fixed charges for the year ended
          December 31, 2002 was (0.75), as noted above, which represents a deficiency
          of $383 million.</font></p></td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:4.46%;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>Certification Pursuant to Rules 13a-14 and 15d-14</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>of the 1934 Securities Exchange Act</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>I, E. James Ferland, certify that:</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>I have reviewed this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of Public Service Enterprise Group Incorporated; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>3.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>4.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(c)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(d)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's third fiscal quarter in the case of this quarterly report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>5.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions): </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

        <td width="55%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

        <td width="32%" valign=top style='border-bottom: solid black 1.0pt; padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>November 1, 2006</font></p> </td>
        <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:4.46%;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>Certification Pursuant to Rules 13a-14 and 15d-14</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>of the 1934 Securities Exchange Act</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>I, Thomas M. O&#146;Flynn, certify that:</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>I have reviewed this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of Public Service Enterprise Group Incorporated;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>4.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's third fiscal quarter in the case of this quarterly report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>5.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions): </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="92%" style='margin-left:5.4pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="32%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="55%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Date:</font></p> </td>
        <td width="32%" valign=top style='border-bottom: solid black 1.0pt; padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>November 1, 2006</font></p> </td>
        <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="55%" valign=top style='border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt; padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>/s/ Thomas M. O&#146;Flynn</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="32%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="4%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="55%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><b><font size=2>Thomas M. O&#146;Flynn</font></b></p>  </td> </tr>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="32%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Public Service Enterprise Group Incorporated</font></p> </td> </tr>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>

        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><B><font SIZE=2>EXHIBIT 31.2</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:4.46%;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>Certification Pursuant to Rules 13a-14 and 15d-14</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>of the 1934 Securities Exchange Act</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:6pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>I, E. James Ferland, certify that: </font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>I have reviewed this Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of Public Service Electric and Gas Company; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>3.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="2%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>4.</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left: 0in;text-align:justify'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td width="3%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="7%" valign=top style='padding:6.0pt 0in 6.0pt 0in'>
